About Crescent Oaks
Crescent Oaks Golf Club is a Semi-Private golf club located in Tarpon Springs. the 18 Hole championship course, designed by renowned architect Steve Smyers, is a local favorite.
Built in 1991, the Crescent Oaks measures in at 6,914 yards from the championship tees and provides a fair but challenging test for the best. The par 72 packs a punch at a 138/74 slope and course rating, while the picturesque Brooker Creek Preserve provides for a beautiful yet penal setting.
The range of tee boxes are smartly positioned to allow golfers of every level to have success, from new player to seasoned vet, and offers semi private open to the public.
The 17,000 square-foot Mediterranean style clubhouse provides an elegant and comfortable place to gather with members, friends, and family. Amenities include a dining room overlooking the first tee, a member/guest grill, a fully stocked pro shop, locker rooms and exercise facility. In addition, Crescent Oaks offers a first class tennis club perfect for a friendly or competitive match, offering your choice of red clay or hard courts.
Crescent Oaks is a family-owned, Semi-Private Club located in Tarpon Springs, Florida.
EMPLOYMENT APPLICATION
DOWNLOAD APPLICATION
Once you have completed your application please email it to our GM, Brady Deroo, at cogm@crescentoaksgolf.com

MEMBERSHIPS
ANNUAL MEMBERSHIP
Our annual golf membership is the most popular and exclusive  membership we offer at Crescent Oaks Golf Club, with many additional benefits
BECOME A MEMBER
FULL GOLF MEMBERSHIP BENEFITS
Unlimited Green Fees
Unlimited Range Balls
Walking Privileges May-Oct After 1am; Nov-April after 2pm
Reduced Green Fees for up to 3 guests
10% Off Restaurant
Priority access to Social Events Tournaments and Leagues
$10 Off GHIN Handicap
PAR Membership
$79/Month
Full time Florida residence with a valid Florida ID
Free Walking after 1pm (May- Oct) after 2pm (Nov-Apr)
$17 Cart Fee after 1pm (May-Oct) after 2pm (Nov-Apr)
50% off Range Balls
Discounted Green Fees
Reduced Green Fees for up to 3 Guests
10% Off Pro Shop Merchandise
10% Off Restaurant
$10 Off GHIN Handicap
Social Membership $39/Month
Full access to all events
Bonus hour of Happy Hour Mon-Sat
10% Discount on qualified food purchases

WEDDING AND EVENT VENUE near Tampa
Crescent Oaks Golf Club offers a beautiful and unique Wedding and Event Venue near Tampa. Celebrate indoors or out at this venue that offers two ceremony locations. The clubhouse venue spans 10,000 square feet. The timeless beauty of the architecture is displayed in the newly renovated clubhouse and surroundings. The entrance welcomes you with a tall arched doorway. The rustic appeal is accentuated by the expansive windows that peer out onto the lovely environment of the surrounding outdoors. Dine and dance with your friends and family in the ballroom or gather for smaller weddings in one of multiple locations. Step out onto the covered veranda
Previous
Next
for a ceremony or cocktail party. Outdoor ceremonies are enclosed by the natural surroundings of green space, trees and flowers. Steal a moment with your soon-to-be spouse on a secluded bridge amid the mature trees for a special greeting or photograph. The Crescent Oaks Country Club can host up to 250 people at one of their indoor or outdoor locations. Whether choosing to celebrate indoors or out, you can customize the space to reflect your personality and wishes for the big day.
Event Testimonials
Matthew Sodano
May 2025
"Beautiful Wedding & Flawless Coordination"
Our
wedding
was this past weekend. The coordinator, Hope, had everything organized very well. No problems and able to respond to last minute small changes. The food was excellent, prepared on time. Wait staff was helpful to us, bartenders had no trouble keeping up. No issues with the room, furnishings or
wedding ceremony
area, it was a beautiful day and a beautiful
wedding
. The location was convenient to our house and hotels/airbnb for guests. Would definitely recommend!
Becky Cook
May 2025
"Exceptional Service & Amazing Food "
Hope Deroo, Event Coordinator, and her staff provided our organization with an amazing experience! Hope was professional, flexible, helpful, and cheerful. The staff was also very professional and courteous and provided outstanding service. The bartender had some delicious drinks. The Executive Chef, Mark, created and delivered and delicious meal. Thank you to Hope, Mark and the entire staff for allowing us to create a memorable event!
Raquel Pinero
June 2025
"Highly Recommend for Professional & Social Events"
Crescent Oaks Golf Club was a wonderful experience. We at The Nurse Lawyer had a wonderful experience with our Event and we recommend them to everyone. Thank you!
Matthew Sodano
May 2025
Our
wedding
was this past weekend. The coordinator, Hope, had everything organized very well. No problems and able to respond to last minute small changes. The food was excellent, prepared on time. Wait staff was helpful to us, bartenders had no trouble keeping up. No issues with the room, furnishings or
wedding ceremony
area, it was a beautiful day and a beautiful
wedding
. The location was convenient to our house and hotels/airbnb for guests. Would definitely recommend!
